SEARCH
Package userDisplay

Class UserDisplayComponentAdapter

java.lang.Object
userDisplay.UserDisplayComponentAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDisplayComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlarmDisplayTable, AnalogDiagnosticsDisplay, ClipDisplayPanel, DetectionGroupTable, DifarDisplayContainer, DifarDisplayContainer2, RadarDisplayComponent, SonobuoyManagerContainer, SpectrogramDisplayComponent, TDControl
public abstract class UserDisplayComponentAdapter extends Object implements UserDisplayComponent
Adapter class for UserDisplayComponent which manages some of the functions which may not be needed to all display components.
Author:
dg50
